front.title: Cloud Data Management Interface (CDMI) Media Types

abstract.t: This document describes several Internet media types defined for the Cloud Data Management Interface (CDMI) by the Storage Networking Industry Association (SNIA). The media types are: o application/cdmi-object o application/cdmi-container o application/cdmi-domain o application/cdmi-capability o application/cdmi-queue This document is not an Internet Standards Track specification; it is published for informational purposes.
